data.description: 与之前版本相比放出了热搜栏

data.name: 百度搜索页面极简
data.description: 最简洁百度搜索页面，默认隐藏热搜栏目，hover后显示
data.css: /* i really want this to be global */.s_ipt_wr,#content_left .result-op,#content_left .result,.bdsug li,#content_right,.s_btn,.bdpfmenu a,.usermenu a{transition:all .3s;}a{text-decoration:none;}a:link{color:#4879BD;}a:visited{color:#bbb;}a:hover{color:#4879BD;}a:active{color:#4879BD;}body{font-family:Microsoft YaHei;color:#444;}#wrapper_wrapper{background-color:#f8f8f8;}.container_l{width:100%;}#content_left{max-width:1083px;padding-left:130px;}#content_left .result-op,#content_left .result{width:670px !important;cursor:default;line-height:1.7;vertical-align:top;margin:0 10px 20px 10px;display:inline-block;background-color:#fff;padding:15px;border-radius:10px;box-shadow:0 0 12px #ececec;}#content_left > div:hover{box-shadow:0 0 12px #ccc;}#content_left .result-op > h3 > a,#content_left .result > h3 > a,#content_left .result-op > h3 > a > em,#content_left .result > h3 > a > em{text-decoration:unset;position:relative;}#content_left .result-op > h3 > a:visited,#content_left .result > h3 > a:visited,#content_left .result-op > h3 > a:visited > em,#content_left .result > h3 > a:visited > em{color:#bbb;}#content_left .result-op > h3 > a:after,#content_left .result > h3 > a:after{content:"";position:absolute;right:0;bottom:-3px;width:0;height:2px;background-color:#3676d6;transition:all .5s;}#content_left .result-op > h3 > a:hover:after,#content_left .result > h3 > a:hover:after{left:0;width:100%;}.c-abstract{font-size:12px;}.container_s #content_right{width:auto;}#content_right{position:fixed;background-color:#fff;width:auto;z-index:999;border-width:0px;box-shadow:0 0 12px #ccc;padding:40px 20px 20px 60px;border-radius:0 20px 20px 0;transform:translateX(-100%);margin-top:0;left:0;}#content_right > table{max-height:750px;overflow:auto;display:block;padding-right:20px;}#content_right:after{content:"热搜";position:absolute;top:300px;right:-31px;width:26px;height:60px;color:#fff;font-size:18px;padding:5px 0 0 5px;border-radius:0 8px 8px 0;background-color:#3f8ef1;}#content_right:hover{transform:translateX(0);}#content_right > table::-webkit-scrollbar{width:5px;height:1px;}#content_right > table::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:10px;background:#C5C5C5;}#content_right > table::-webkit-scrollbar-track{border-radius:10px;background:#ededed;}.nums,.search_tool_conter{margin:0 0 0 150px;}.s_form{padding:0 0 0 130px;}#result_logo{display:none;}#rs{background-color:transparent;margin-left:150px;}#page{padding-left:150px;}#s_tab{padding:60px 0 0 145px;}.c-icon-tieba,.c-icon-zhidao,.c-icon-bear-p,.c-icon-bear-pn{opacity:0;}.s_ipt_wr.bg,.s_btn_wr.bg,#su.bg{border-radius:30px;margin-left:5px;}.s_ipt_wr{border-right-width:1px;border-color:#cecece;}.s_ipt_wr:hover{border-color:#277bf7;}.s_ipt{margin-left:10px;}#head .bdsug{border-radius:20px;overflow:hidden;top:40px;left:5px;padding:10px 0;border-width:0px;box-shadow:0 0 12px #bbb;animation:searchTip .3s forwards;}@keyframes searchTip{from{transform:translateY(20px);opacity:0;}to{transform:translateY(0px);opacity:1;}}.bdsug-feedback-wrap{display:none;}.bdsug li{padding:8px 10px;cursor:pointer;}.bdsug li > b{font-weight:normal;color:#1a67da;}.c-tip-con,.bdpfmenu,.usermenu,.s-mod-msg{animation:searchTip .3s forwards;}.soutu-layer{top:44px;left:5px;border-radius:20px;overflow:hidden;}.bdpfmenu,.usermenu{border-radius:10px;overflow:hidden;}.toindex{display:none;}#s_msg_content{border-radius:10px;overflow:hidden;}.foot-inner{text-align:center;}#help{float:none !important;}#page a,#page strong{background-color:transparent;}#page a.n{background-color:#fff;transition:all .3s;}#page a .pc{background-color:#fff;transition:all .3s;}#page a:hover .pc,#page a.n:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#38f;}.CwvaZl,.RCFKra{display:none;}

data.name: Télérama WideScreen - New design v.16
data.description: Pour un grand écran (1920x1080)! , un programme en grand ! Prend en compte la dernière modification des pages fiches film / programme. NEW: Suppression du Popup "Abonnez-vous" Et nouveau, pour chaque émission, une icône "Oeil" qui, sur un hover, affiche les infos du programme... Disponible seul: Telerama - Programmes Infos Visible on Hover v.11

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

data.name: dark ejudge [msu]
data.description:
обновленный, темный стиль для "любимого" ежужа, дабы ваши глазки не сгорали во время ночных посиделок за праком.

Ну и так как я ленивая жопа, чтобы тестить на разных браузерах, я не гарантирую полную работоспособность где либо, кроме opera 66 и выше

data.name: Prettify text.npr.org
data.description: Simple styles to make reading Text-Only NPR.org an experience more similar to reading the main version of the website.
